page.title: 17LIFE STYLES
page.content: We did a survey into a typical day in the life of a child in the Barkham area.The results were as follows.The typical weekday consists of having breakfast and then preparing for school.School takes up most of the day and when the children arrive home they go out to play with their friends.After arriving home and having tea/dinner,they usually watch a good deal of television before bed.At the weekend children usually watch television for a while and after changing they go to town shopping which is usually unpopular.When they come home they often go out to play then come home they often go out to play then they have tea and watch television before bed.
